title: Searching for Flex Queue
body:
Hey everybody,

I´m a bronze 4 scrub in soloq. I dont blame anyone for that, just want to try out something else, e.g. Flex. 
I´m currently onetricking shen{{champion:98}}  but have a whole season of experience in the support role as well.
If you´d like to play flex with me, feel free to message me ingame 
IGN: FreeGa1
